summary: The diff contains modifications to application code files (backend/main.mo, frontend hooks, pages, and documentation) but does not show any deployment configuration changes, deployment scripts, or evidence of actual deployment activity to production. The BuildRequest explicitly requires retrying a deployment to production without modifying existing code or functionality, yet the diff shows code modifications across 9 files with no deployment artifacts.

missing_requirements.requirement: Retry the deployment of Version 42 to production network after resolving the previous deployment error
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment artifacts, scripts, configuration changes, or deployment logs are present in the diff. The diff only shows application code modifications, not deployment activity.

hallucinated_features.description: Application code modifications across backend and frontend files
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints explicitly state 'Do not modify any existing code or functionality' and non-goals include 'Modifying existing UI or backend logic'. However, the diff shows modifications to backend/main.mo and multiple frontend TypeScript files.
